item.title: Clintons won't testify in Epstein probe as House Oversight GOP threatens contempt
item.description: Republican Rep. James Comer of Kentucky, the committee's chairman, said the panel will move next week on holding them in contempt.

item.title: MoneyWatch price tracker shows how much food, utility, housing costs are rising
item.description: These charts track prices consumers pay for groceries and other goods now compared to five years ago.

item.title: CPI rose at 2.7% annual rate in December as inflation remains sticky
item.description: Although there are signs that inflation is starting to ease, consumers still face pressures from high food prices and other costs.

item.title: Listen Live: Supreme Court hears arguments over transgender athlete bans

item.title: Mother of one of Elon Musk's kids says AI chatbot Grok generated sexual deepfake images of her
item.description: Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok is facing intense criticism, accused of allowing X users to generate sexually explicit images of real women and children. ...
